blog.description: Stay updated with the latest fashion trends, sustainability news, style tips, and behind-the-scenes stories from TeIpsum. Discover sustainable fashion insights and expert advice.
blog.keywords: fashion blog, style tips, sustainable fashion trends, fashion news, TeIpsum blog, fashion advice, sustainability fashion, eco-friendly fashion tips
blog.imageAlt: TeIpsum Fashion Blog - Trends and Sustainability
blog.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest fashion trends, sustainability news, style tips, and behind-the-scenes stories from the TeIpsum team.
blog.tryDifferentCategory: Try selecting a different category or check back later for new content.
blog.post1Title: Sustainable Fashion: The Future is Here
blog.post1Excerpt: Discover how TeIpsum is leading the charge in sustainable fashion with eco-friendly materials and ethical production practices.
blog.post2Excerpt: Explore the vibrant colors that will define spring fashion this year, from soft pastels to bold earth tones.
blog.post3Title: How to Style Your Capsule Wardrobe
blog.post3Excerpt: Master the art of minimalist dressing with our guide to creating versatile outfits from essential pieces.
blog.post4Excerpt: We're excited to announce the opening of our new flagship store in Warsaw, featuring our complete collection and personalized styling services.
blog.post5Title: The Art of Layering in Winter
blog.post5Excerpt: Stay warm and stylish with our expert tips on layering techniques that work for any winter occasion.
blog.post6Title: Behind the Scenes: Our Design Process
blog.post6Excerpt: Take a peek into our creative process and see how our designers bring sustainable fashion concepts to life.
blog.post7Title: Denim Decoded: Finding Your Perfect Fit
blog.post7Excerpt: From skinny to wide-leg, discover which denim styles work best for your body type and personal style.
blog.post8Excerpt: Learn about our new take-back program and how we're turning old garments into new sustainable fashion pieces.
blog.post9Excerpt: Transform any outfit with the right accessories. Our styling experts share their top tips for accessory mastery.

stayUpdated: Stay updated with our latest collections and exclusive offers.
registerSubtitle: Join TeIpsum and discover your style
loginSubtitle: Sign in to your account to continue
newCollectionSubtitle: Discover the latest trends and innovative designs
bestsellersSubtitle: Discover the most loved pieces by our customers
discountsSubtitle: Discover amazing deals on our premium collection
welcomeBonusText: Join our community and enjoy exclusive benefits with your first order!
completeWithoutAccount: You can still complete your order without creating an account
faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about TeIpsum. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact us!
noQuestionsFound: No questions found matching your search. Try different keywords or browse all categories.
customerServiceHelp: Our customer service team is here to help with any questions not covered here.
returnPolicyAnswer:
We offer a generous 30-day return policy:

  • Items must be unworn, unwashed, and in original condition
  • All original tags must be attached
  • Returns are free for domestic orders
  • Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days

Some items like underwear and earrings cannot be returned for hygiene reasons.
howToReturnQuestion: How do I return an item?
howToReturnAnswer:
Returning items is simple:

  • Email returns@teipsum.com with your order number
  • We'll send you a prepaid return label within 24 hours
  • Package your items and attach the return label
  • Drop off at any post office

You'll receive an email confirmation once we receive and process your return.
howToFindSizeQuestion: How do I find my size?
howToFindSizeAnswer:
Getting the right fit is important to us:

  • Check our detailed size guide on each product page
  • Measure yourself using our sizing instructions
  • Read customer reviews for fit insights
  • Contact our customer service for personalized sizing help

If you're between sizes, we generally recommend sizing up for a more comfortable fit.
orderDoesntFitQuestion: What if my order doesn't fit?
orderDoesntFitAnswer:
No worries! We offer free exchanges for size issues:

  • Size exchanges are processed within 3-5 business days
  • We'll send the new size as soon as we receive your return
  • Original shipping costs are not refunded for exchanges
careClotheQuestion: How should I care for my TeIpsum clothes?
careClotheAnswer:
Proper care will help your TeIpsum pieces last longer:

  • Always check the care label on each garment
  • Wash in cold water to preserve colors and fabric
  • Air dry when possible to maintain shape
  • Iron on low heat if needed
  • Store properly on hangers or folded
needAccountQuestion: Do I need an account to shop?
needAccountAnswer:
You can shop as a guest, but creating an account has benefits:

  • Faster checkout for future orders
  • Order tracking and history
  • Exclusive member offers
  • Wishlist functionality
  • Early access to sales
resetPasswordQuestion: How do I reset my password?
resetPasswordAnswer:
To reset your password:

  • Go to the login page and click 'Forgot Password'
  • Enter your email address
  • Check your email for reset instructions
  • Follow the link to create a new password
customersResponsibleDuties: Customers are responsible for any customs duties or taxes
deliveryTimesVary: Delivery times may vary due to customs processing
someRestrictions: Some restrictions may apply to certain countries

urbanSophisticationDesc: Modern silhouettes for the contemporary soul. Versatile pieces that transition seamlessly from day to night.
artisanCollectionDesc: Handcrafted details and unique textures. Limited pieces that celebrate individual expression and artistry.
exploreThoughtfulDesigns: Explore our complete range of thoughtfully designed pieces
discoverSustainableFashion: Discover our latest sustainable fashion pieces
lightBrightDesc: Embrace summer in style with flowing silhouettes, earthy tones, and breathable fabrics designed for warm days and cool nights. Our sustainable approach ensures every piece is both beautiful and environmentally conscious.
timelessEleganceDesc: Discover our signature pieces that blend classic sophistication with contemporary comfort, perfect for any occasion. Each garment is meticulously crafted with attention to detail and sustainable practices.

startShopping: Start shopping to see your order history here
title: Title
messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...
messageSuccess: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.
messageError: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
foundingStory: Founded in 2020, TeIpsum began as a small boutique in the heart of the city, driven by a passion for creating clothing that speaks to the soul. Our founder, inspired by the philosophy of "vestments for the inner dialogue," believed that what we wear should reflect not just our style, but our inner journey.
philosophyText: Every piece in our collection is designed with intention. We believe that clothing is more than fabric and thread‚Äîit's a form of self-expression, a way to communicate who we are and who we aspire to be. Our minimalist approach focuses on quality, comfort, and timeless elegance.
communityText: TeIpsum is more than a brand‚Äîit's a community of individuals who value authenticity, creativity, and mindful living. We celebrate diversity and encourage everyone to find their unique voice through fashion.
futureVisionText: As we grow, we remain committed to our core values: thoughtful design, sustainable practices, and meaningful connections with our customers. We envision a future where fashion is both beautiful and purposeful.
sustainabilityText: We're committed to ethical fashion practices, using sustainable materials and supporting fair labor conditions. Our production process prioritizes environmental responsibility while maintaining the highest quality standards.
organicMaterialsDesc: We prioritize organic cotton, hemp, and other sustainable materials in our production process. 80% of our new collections feature eco-friendly fabrics.
circularFashionDesc: Our take-back program allows customers to return old garments for recycling. We turn textile waste into new products, reducing landfill impact.
waterConservationDesc: We've reduced water usage in our production by 40% through innovative dyeing techniques and water recycling systems in our partner facilities.
renewableEnergyDesc: Our facilities run on 100% renewable energy. Solar panels and wind power fuel our operations, reducing our carbon footprint significantly.
sustainablePackagingDesc: All our packaging is biodegradable or recyclable. We use minimal packaging and plant-based inks for printing on all our materials.
fairLaborDesc: We ensure fair wages and safe working conditions throughout our supply chain. Regular audits guarantee ethical manufacturing practices.
howToPlaceOrder: How do I place an order?
howToPlaceOrderAnswer:
Placing an order is easy! Follow these simple steps:

  • Browse our collections and add items to your cart
  • Click the cart icon to review your items
  • Proceed to checkout and enter your shipping information
  • Choose your payment method and complete your purchase

You'll receive an order confirmation email with tracking information once your order ships.
canModifyOrder: Can I modify or cancel my order?
canModifyOrderAnswer:
We process orders quickly to get them to you as soon as possible. Here's what you need to know:

Modifications: Contact us within 1 hour of placing your order at orders@teipsum.com

Cancellations: Orders can be cancelled within 2 hours if they haven't been processed yet.

Once an order has shipped, you can use our return process if needed.
shippingTimeAnswer:
Shipping times depend on your location and chosen method:

  • Standard Shipping: 3-5 business days (FREE on orders over $75)
  • Express Shipping: 1-2 business days ($15.99)
  • International: 7-14 business days (varies by destination)

All orders are processed within 1-2 business days before shipping.
internationalShippingAnswer: Yes! We ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping costs start at $25.99 and vary by destination.
orderNotesPlaceholder: Any special instructions for your order...
orderWillBeProcessed: Your order will be processed shortly.
errorOccurred: Something went wrong. Please try again.
loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
passwordResetNotice: Password reset functionality would be implemented here. Please contact support for now.

sizeGuide.title: Size Guide
sizeGuide.subtitle: Find your perfect fit with our comprehensive size guide. Still unsure? Contact us for personalized assistance.
sizeGuide.chestBustDesc: Measure around the fullest part of your chest/bust, keeping the tape measure level and snug but not tight.
sizeGuide.chestBustTip: Tip: Wear a well-fitting bra when measuring for the most accurate result.
sizeGuide.chestDesc: Measure around the fullest part of your chest, keeping the tape measure level and snug but not tight.
sizeGuide.chestTip: Tip: Keep your arms relaxed at your sides for the most accurate measurement.
sizeGuide.chestDescKids: Measure around the fullest part of your child's chest, keeping the tape measure level and snug but not tight.
sizeGuide.chestTipKids: Tip: Measure while your child is wearing a light shirt for the most accurate result.
sizeGuide.waistDesc: Measure around your natural waistline, which is typically the narrowest part of your torso.
sizeGuide.waistTip: Tip: Don't hold your breath! Breathe normally for an accurate measurement.
sizeGuide.hipsDesc: Measure around the fullest part of your hips, typically about 8 inches below your waist.
sizeGuide.hipsTip: Tip: Stand with feet together for the most accurate measurement.
sizeGuide.heightDesc: Stand straight against a wall and measure from the top of your head to the floor.
sizeGuide.heightTip: Tip: Remove shoes and have someone help you for best accuracy.
sizeGuide.tip1: If you're between sizes, we generally recommend sizing up for comfort
sizeGuide.tip2: Check individual product pages for specific fit notes
sizeGuide.tip3: Read customer reviews for real-world fit insights
sizeGuide.tip4: Consider the fabric type - some materials have more stretch than others
sizeGuide.tip5: When in doubt, contact our customer service for personalized recommendations
sizeGuide.stillNotSure: Still not sure? We offer free exchanges on all domestic orders, so you can find your perfect fit risk-free!
sizeGuide.needHelpDesc: Our customer service team is trained to help you find the perfect fit. Contact us with your measurements and we'll recommend the best size for you.

newCollection.title: New Collection 2025
newCollection.subtitle: Discover the Latest Fashion Trends
newCollection.description: Explore our carefully curated new arrivals featuring the latest trends in sustainable fashion. Each piece is designed with attention to detail and crafted from premium materials.

shippingPage.title: Shipping Information
shippingPage.subtitle: Fast, reliable delivery options to get your TeIpsum pieces to you safely and quickly.
shippingPage.description: We offer multiple shipping options to ensure your order arrives when you need it.
shippingPage.standardDesc: Perfect for regular orders with no rush. Your items will be carefully packaged and delivered to your doorstep.
shippingPage.expressDesc: When you need your TeIpsum pieces quickly. Priority handling and expedited shipping.
shippingPage.internationalDesc: We ship worldwide! Delivery times vary by destination. All customs fees are the customer's responsibility.
shippingPage.freeShippingPromo: FREE Standard Shipping on all orders over $75!
shippingPage.processingDesc: All orders are processed within 1-2 business days. Orders placed after 2 PM Friday will be processed the following Monday.
shippingPage.packagingDesc: We use eco-friendly packaging materials. Your items arrive in recyclable boxes with minimal environmental impact.
shippingPage.note1: Delivery times are estimates and may be affected by weather or other unforeseen circumstances
shippingPage.note2: P.O. Box addresses are not accepted for Express Delivery
shippingPage.note3: Signature confirmation may be required for orders over $200
shippingPage.note4: International customers are responsible for any customs duties or taxes
shippingPage.note5: We ship Monday through Friday, excluding holidays

returns.title: Returns & Exchanges
returns.subtitle: We want you to love your TeIpsum pieces. If you're not completely satisfied, we're here to help.
returns.returnWindowDesc: You have 30 days from the delivery date to return items for a full refund or exchange.
returns.originalConditionDesc: Items must be unworn, unwashed, and in original condition with all tags attached.
returns.freeShippingDesc: We provide prepaid return labels for all domestic returns. International returns may incur shipping costs.
returns.step1: Contact Us: Email returns@teipsum.com or use our online return portal with your order number.
returns.step2: Receive Return Label: We'll send you a prepaid return shipping label within 24 hours.
returns.step3: Package Items: Place items in original packaging (if available) or any secure packaging.
returns.step4: Attach Label: Attach the prepaid return label to your package.
returns.step5: Drop Off: Drop off at any post office or schedule a pickup.
returns.step6: Get Refund: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive your return.
returns.sizeExchangesDesc: Need a different size? We'll expedite your exchange to get you the right fit as quickly as possible.
returns.colorExchangesDesc: Want a different color or style? Exchanges are subject to availability and price differences may apply.
returns.proTip: üí° Pro Tip: For faster exchanges, you can order the new item and return the original separately.
returns.cannotReturnWarning: The following items cannot be returned for hygiene and safety reasons:
returns.cannotReturnList:
‚Ä¢ Underwear and intimate apparel
‚Ä¢ Swimwear (unless tags are still attached)
‚Ä¢ Earrings and pierced jewelry
‚Ä¢ Items marked as "Final Sale"
‚Ä¢ Gift cards
‚Ä¢ Items damaged by normal wear and tear
returns.refundMethodDesc: Refunds are issued to the original payment method used for the purchase.
returns.refundProcessingDesc: Refunds typically appear on your statement within 5-10 business days after processing.
returns.giftReturnsDesc: Items purchased as gifts can be returned for store credit if no receipt is provided.

sustainability.pageSubtitle: Fashion that cares for our planet. We're dedicated to creating beautiful clothing while protecting the environment for future generations.
sustainability.joinMissionText: Every purchase you make supports sustainable fashion. Together, we can create a more sustainable future for fashion and our planet. Thank you for choosing conscious style.
sustainability.certificationsText: Certified by GOTS (Global Organic Textile Standard), OEKO-TEX, and B-Corp. These certifications ensure our commitment to environmental and social responsibility.
sustainability.supplyChainTransparencyText: We maintain complete transparency about our suppliers and manufacturing processes. Annual sustainability reports detail our progress and challenges.
sustainability.impactMeasurementText: We continuously measure and report our environmental impact, from carbon emissions to water usage, ensuring accountability in our sustainability journey.

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.subtitle: Build your career with TeIpsum and help shape the future of sustainable fashion. We're looking for passionate individuals who share our values and vision.
careers.description: Join our mission to create sustainable fashion and make a positive impact on the world.
careers.innovationDesc: We embrace creativity and fresh ideas. Every team member is encouraged to think outside the box and contribute to our innovative culture.
careers.collaborationDesc: We believe in the power of teamwork. Open communication and mutual support drive our success as a fashion-forward company.
careers.growthDesc: Personal and professional development is at our core. We provide opportunities for learning, advancement, and skill building.
careers.excellenceDesc: We strive for quality in everything we do, from our products to our customer service and workplace culture.
careers.sustainabilityValueDesc: Environmental responsibility guides our decisions. We're committed to sustainable fashion and business practices.
careers.passionDesc: We love what we do and it shows. Our passion for fashion and customer satisfaction drives everything we create.
careers.frontendDevDesc: Join our tech team to build amazing user experiences for our e-commerce platform. Work with React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies.
careers.req4: Knowledge of responsive design and accessibility
careers.req5: Familiarity with Redux and modern state management
careers.fashionDesignerDesc: Create innovative and sustainable fashion designs that align with our brand vision. Lead seasonal collections and trend research.
careers.req10: Strong portfolio demonstrating creativity and technical skills
careers.digitalMarketingDesc: Drive our digital marketing initiatives across social media, email, and paid advertising channels. Focus on brand awareness and customer acquisition.
careers.req11: Bachelor's degree in Marketing or related field
careers.req13: Experience with Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and analytics tools
careers.req14: Strong content creation and copywriting skills
careers.customerServiceDesc: Provide exceptional customer support through multiple channels. Help customers with orders, returns, and product inquiries while maintaining our high service standards.
careers.req16: Excellent communication skills in English and Polish
careers.supplyChainDesc: Coordinate with suppliers and manage inventory to ensure efficient operations. Focus on sustainable sourcing and ethical supply chain practices.
careers.req21: Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain Management or related field
careers.req25: Understanding of fashion industry supply chains
careers.noOpenings: No current openings in this category
careers.applyThankYou: Thank you for your interest in the
careers.applyInstructions: position! Please send your resume to careers@teipsum.com
careers.tryAdjustingFiltersCareers: Try adjusting your filters or check back later for new opportunities

accessibility.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibility.subtitle: TeIpsum is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for all users, regardless of ability. We continually improve the user experience for everyone.
accessibility.description: We are committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities.
accessibility.commitmentDesc1: We believe that everyone should have equal access to fashion and online shopping. TeIpsum is dedicated to providing an inclusive, accessible, and user-friendly experience for all visitors, including those who rely on assistive technologies.
accessibility.commitmentDesc2: Our accessibility efforts are guided by the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA standards, ensuring our website meets international accessibility requirements.
accessibility.screenReaderDesc: Our website is fully compatible with screen readers like JAWS, NVDA, and VoiceOver. All images include descriptive alt text, and navigation is optimized for assistive technologies.
accessibility.keyboardDesc: Navigate our entire website using only your keyboard. All interactive elements are accessible via Tab, Enter, and arrow keys with clear focus indicators.
accessibility.textScalingDesc: Zoom text up to 200% without horizontal scrolling or loss of functionality. Our responsive design adapts to different text sizes and browser zoom levels.
accessibility.highContrastDesc: Enhanced color contrast ratios meet WCAG AA standards. Important information is never conveyed through color alone, and we support high contrast display modes.
accessibility.noTimeLimitsDesc: Take your time browsing and shopping. We don't impose time limits on forms or sessions, and any automatic content updates can be paused or controlled.
accessibility.seizureSafeDesc: Our content avoids flashing elements and rapid animations that could trigger seizures. Motion can be reduced through browser settings and our design preferences.
accessibility.semanticHTMLDesc: Proper heading structure and landmark regions for easy navigation
accessibility.altTextDesc: Descriptive alternative text for all images and graphics
accessibility.formLabelsDesc: Clear, descriptive labels for all form inputs
accessibility.colorContrastDesc: High contrast ratios for text and background colors
accessibility.focusManagementDesc: Visible focus indicators and logical tab order
accessibility.ariaLabelsDesc: Additional context for complex interactive elements
accessibility.responsiveDesignDesc: Mobile-friendly layout that works with assistive technologies
accessibility.errorHandlingDesc: Clear, descriptive error messages and validation feedback
accessibility.assistiveTechDesc: Our website has been tested with various assistive technologies and browsers:
accessibility.magnificationList: ZoomText, browser zoom, OS magnification tools
accessibility.complianceDesc: TeIpsum strives to conform to WCAG 2.1 Level AA guidelines, Section 508 of the Rehabilitation Act, and the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA). We regularly audit our website to ensure continued compliance and optimal accessibility.
accessibility.ongoingDesc: Accessibility is an ongoing effort. We regularly:
accessibility.improvement1: Conduct accessibility audits and user testing
accessibility.improvement2: Train our team on accessibility best practices
accessibility.improvement3: Update our website based on user feedback and new standards
accessibility.improvement4: Test new features with assistive technologies before release
accessibility.improvement5: Collaborate with accessibility experts and the disability community
accessibility.recommendationsDesc: For the best accessible experience, we recommend:
accessibility.recommendation1: Using the latest version of your preferred browser
accessibility.recommendation2: Keeping your operating system and assistive technologies updated
accessibility.recommendation4: Using browsers that support modern web standards (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
accessibility.feedbackDesc: We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of TeIpsum. If you encounter any barriers or have suggestions for improvement, please let us know:
accessibility.contactAddress: üìç TeIpsum Accessibility Team, ul. Fashion 123, 90-001 ≈Å√≥d≈∫, Poland
accessibility.responseTime: We aim to respond to accessibility feedback within 3 business days.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How We Protect Your Information
privacy.description: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.introductionDesc1: TeIpsum ("we," "our," or "us") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and share information about you when you use our website and services.
privacy.introductionDesc2: This policy applies to all information collected or submitted on the TeIpsum website and mobile applications.
privacy.personalInformationDesc: We may collect the following personal information:
privacy.personalInfo1: Name and contact information (email, phone number, address)
privacy.personalInfo2: Payment information (credit card details, billing address)
privacy.automaticallyCollectedDesc: We automatically collect certain information when you visit our website:
privacy.autoInfo3: Pages visited and time spent on our site
privacy.howWeUseInfoDesc: We use your information for the following purposes:
privacy.useInfo3: Sending order confirmations and shipping updates
privacy.informationSharingDesc: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following circumstances:
privacy.shareInfo1: Service Providers: Third-party vendors who help us operate our business (payment processors, shipping companies, email services)
privacy.shareInfo2: Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
privacy.shareInfo3: Business Transfers: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
privacy.shareInfo4: Consent: When you give us explicit permission to share your information
privacy.cookiesDesc1: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.
privacy.cookieType1: Essential Cookies: Necessary for website functionality
privacy.cookieType2: Analytics Cookies: Help us understand how visitors use our site
privacy.cookieType3: Marketing Cookies: Used to deliver relevant advertisements
privacy.cookieType4: Preference Cookies: Remember your settings and preferences
privacy.dataSecurityDesc1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no internet transmission is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy.yourRightsDesc: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:
privacy.right1: Access: Request a copy of your personal data
privacy.right2: Correction: Update or correct inaccurate information
privacy.right3: Deletion: Request deletion of your personal data
privacy.right4: Portability: Receive your data in a structured format
privacy.right5: Objection: Object to certain processing of your data
privacy.right6: Restriction: Limit how we use your data
privacy.right7: Withdrawal: Withdraw consent at any time
privacy.dataRetentionDesc1: We retain your personal information only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy, comply with legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.
privacy.dataRetentionDesc2: Account information is retained for as long as your account is active. Transaction data is kept for 7 years for accounting and legal purposes. Marketing data is retained until you unsubscribe.
privacy.internationalTransfersDesc: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data during international transfers.
privacy.policyChangesDesc: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy on our website and updating the "Last updated" date.
privacy.contactUsDesc: If you have questions about this privacy policy or how we handle your personal data, please contact us:
privacy.contactAddress: üìç TeIpsum Privacy Officer, ul. Fashion 123, 90-001 ≈Å√≥d≈∫, Poland

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Terms and Conditions
terms.description: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our service.
terms.acceptanceDesc1: By accessing and using the TeIpsum website and services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.
terms.acceptanceDesc2: These terms apply to all users of the site, including without limitation users who are browsers, vendors, customers, merchants, and contributors of content.
terms.useLicenseDesc1: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials on TeIpsum's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title.
terms.useLicenseDesc2: Under this license you may not:
terms.license2: Use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display
terms.license3: Attempt to reverse engineer any software contained on the website
terms.license4: Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials
terms.productInfoDesc1: We strive to provide accurate product descriptions, pricing, and availability information. However, we do not warrant that product descriptions or other content is accurate, complete, reliable, current, or error-free.
terms.productInfoDesc2: If a product offered by TeIpsum is not as described, your sole remedy is to return it in unused condition according to our return policy.
terms.pricingDesc1: All prices are subject to change without notice. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any product at any time. Payment must be received by us before we process your order.
terms.pricingDesc2: We accept major credit cards and other payment methods as displayed during checkout. By providing payment information, you authorize us to charge the specified amount for your order.
terms.shippingDesc1: Shipping costs and delivery times vary by location and shipping method selected. We are not responsible for delays caused by shipping carriers or customs procedures.
terms.shippingDesc2: Risk of loss and title for items purchased from TeIpsum pass to you upon delivery to the carrier.
terms.returnsDesc1: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase for most items in original condition. Please refer to our detailed return policy for complete terms and conditions.
terms.returnsDesc2: Refunds will be processed to the original payment method within 5-7 business days after we receive and process your return.
terms.userAccountsDesc1: When you create an account, you must provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
terms.userAccountsDesc2: You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account. We are not liable for any loss or damage arising from your failure to protect your account information.
terms.prohibitedUsesDesc: You may not use our service:
terms.prohibited1: For any unlawful purpose or to solicit others to unlawful acts
terms.prohibited2: To violate any international, federal, provincial, or state regulations, rules, laws, or local ordinances
terms.prohibited3: To infringe upon or violate our intellectual property rights or the intellectual property rights of others
terms.prohibited4: To harass, abuse, insult, harm, defame, slander, disparage, intimidate, or discriminate
terms.prohibited5: To submit false or misleading information
terms.prohibited6: To upload or transmit viruses or any other type of malicious code
terms.limitationDesc1: In no case shall TeIpsum, our directors, officers, employees, affiliates, agents, contractors, interns, suppliers, service providers, or licensors be liable for any injury, loss, claim, or any direct, indirect, incidental, punitive, special, or consequential damages of any kind.
terms.limitationDesc2: Our maximum liability to you for any claims arising from your use of our services shall not exceed the amount you paid for the products or services in question.
terms.indemnificationDesc: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless TeIpsum and our parent, subsidiaries, affiliates, partners, officers, directors, agents, contractors, licensors, service providers, subcontractors, suppliers, interns, and employees from any claim or demand made by any third party.
terms.governingLawDesc: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Poland, and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that state or location.
terms.changesToTermsDesc: We reserve the right to update or modify these terms of service at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. Your continued use of our services after any changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
terms.questionsDesc: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
terms.legalAddress: üìç TeIpsum Legal Department, ul. Fashion 123, 90-001 ≈Å√≥d≈∫, Poland

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: How We Use Cookies
cookies.description: This policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies on our website.
cookies.whatAreCookiesDesc1: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember information about your visit, making your next visit easier and the site more useful to you.
cookies.whatAreCookiesDesc2: Cookies cannot access, read, or modify any other data on your computer and cannot carry viruses or install malware on your device.
cookies.howWeUseCookiesDesc1: TeIpsum uses cookies to provide, protect, and improve our services. We use cookies for several purposes:
cookies.howWeUseCookiesDesc2: ‚Ä¢ Essential Operations: Enable core website functionality ‚Ä¢ Performance: Analyze how our website is used and improve performance ‚Ä¢ Personalization: Remember your preferences and customize your experience ‚Ä¢ Marketing: Deliver relevant advertisements and measure their effectiveness
cookies.analyticsPurpose: Help us understand how visitors use our website
cookies.analyticsExamples: Google Analytics, page views, user behavior
cookies.thirdPartyDesc1: We work with third-party service providers who may place cookies on your device through our website. These providers include:
cookies.thirdPartyDesc2: ‚Ä¢ Google Analytics: Helps us understand website usage and performance ‚Ä¢ Payment Processors: Enable secure online transactions ‚Ä¢ Social Media Platforms: Allow social sharing and integration ‚Ä¢ Advertising Networks: Deliver targeted advertisements
cookies.thirdPartyDesc3: These third parties have their own privacy policies and cookie practices, which we encourage you to review.
cookies.managingDesc1: You have several options for managing cookies on our website:
cookies.browserSettings: Browser Settings: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can:
cookies.browserSettingsDesc: ‚Ä¢ Accept or reject all cookies ‚Ä¢ Accept only certain types of cookies ‚Ä¢ Receive notifications when cookies are set ‚Ä¢ Delete existing cookies
cookies.consentBanner: Cookie Consent Banner: When you first visit our website, you'll see a cookie consent banner where you can choose which types of cookies to accept.
cookies.optOutTools: Opt-Out Tools: For advertising cookies, you can opt out through industry tools like:
cookies.optOutToolsDesc: ‚Ä¢ Network Advertising Initiative (NAI) ‚Ä¢ Digital Advertising Alliance (DAA) ‚Ä¢ European Interactive Digital Advertising Alliance (EDAA)
cookies.impactDisablingDesc1: While you can browse our website with cookies disabled, please note that some features may not work properly:
cookies.impactDisablingDesc2: ‚Ä¢ Your shopping cart may not remember items ‚Ä¢ You may need to log in repeatedly ‚Ä¢ Personalized recommendations won't be available ‚Ä¢ Some pages may load more slowly ‚Ä¢ You may see less relevant advertisements
cookies.policyUpdatesDesc: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for legal, operational, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any significant changes by updating the policy on our website.
cookies.needMoreInfo: Need More Information? If you have questions about our use of cookies or this Cookie Policy, please contact us at privacy@teipsum.com or +48 123 456 789.

checkBackSoon: Check back soon for our latest collection updates.
